content: In the first section, go right and into the dip with the Searing-Fire. Wait until the ball rolls past, then dash forward and to the left, where a Flamling will appear.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Field_of_Fire_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Field of Fire Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Ashen Pass III' and the sub-subsection 'Nine-Capped Lingzhi Guai'.
The content is as follows:
In the first section, go right and into the dip with the Searing-Fire. Wait until the ball rolls past, then dash forward and to the left, where a Flamling will appear.
